definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Pt. pass. [[רָבוּעַ]] square, of altar Ex 27:1, Ex 30:2, Ex 37:25, Ex 38:1, cf. Ez Eze 43:16; breastplate Eze 30:2, Eze 39:9; pl. [[רְבֻעִים]], of doorways, etc. [on text v. Kit Benz] 1Ki 7:5; fs. [[רְבֻעָה]] as subst. = a square Ez Eze 41:21 (acc. Co Toy, om. [[מְזוּוַת]], and joining ´[[ר]]: to v:Eze 41:20; Krae reads [[מְזוּותׂ רְבֻעׂת]], cf. 1Ki 6:33, [[רְבִייְִ]]

definitions.title: Pu.
definitions.body: Pt. square, [[מְרֻבַּע]] Ez Eze 45:2, of piece of land; fs. [[מְרֻבָָּעַת]] Eze 40:47, of court; fpl. [[מְרֻבָּעוֹת]] 1Ki 7:31 (opp. [[עֲנֻלּוֹת]]), of borders of bases (cf. Sab. [[רבעתם]], a kind of square building, Sab-Denkm:31).
